title: Launcher not Opening
body: I've been having this issue ever since I installed windows 7 64-bit and the launcher doesn't open. The logo pops up, then the launcher frame pops up, but is black, then closes itself after a second of being open. There is no error message, or anything of the sort after it closes.

replies.body:
Hey Darkened, 

This issue generally occurs when you don't have the correct Administrator privileges to launch the game. Could you try to run the game as an administrator? 
- Right-Click on the short-cut
- Select the properties tab
- Check the box labeled "Run as administrator"

Let me know if this works for you!
I have tried to do it that way, but it doesn't at all. Like, not even once.
Same problem here. Client needs a buff before you make new champs plz.

I am also using Windows 7 64 bit. I was just in the middle of a game when it froze and I had to force quit. When I went to log back in I get an error "Update failed: unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information"

Hi NU354,

Please try to avoid  bumping old topics - this post is 4 months old, so what was relevant then may not be any more.

Some people have had luck resolving the issue by changing their Windows Host file as follows:

1) Go to C:\Windows\system32\drivers\etc
2) Open "host" file with notepad
3) Delete everything inside it, and replace it with:

> 127.0.0.1 localhost

Save the file, then try LoL again.

Note: It is recommended you make a backup of the hosts file before doing this incase you need to revert it
Note2: If you are unable to edit the file/save it, save it to your desktop. Then rename the existing one to "host.old", and copy the one from your desktop in its place.
